Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to temporary permits to sell beer and wine not to be consumed on premises
Summary: Relates to temporary permits to sell beer and wine not to be consumed on premises; permits effective for periods not to exceed four hours per day on not more than one day each week for not more than twenty weeks per year to any holder of a license to sell liquor at retail for consumption on the premises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to temporary permits to sell beer and wine not to be consumed on premises
